tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Let's move on to a brighter topic! I'll show you how to verify the validation of conditions with the highlights and values layers.

paragraphs.text: Go to the Trading System layer manager and turn on the Trading System Highlights and the Trading System Values layers...
Now slide the mouse pointer over the candle where the strategy is triggered on!
Use this resource when things are not going as you'd expect! This is how you find out why an event is not triggering when you think it should!
